resources.string:
With the European championship starting in Paris on Saturday, all eyes will be on host France when its gets ball rolling against Romania in the Stade de France.
World champion Germany will be targeting a first Euro title in 20 years while England seeks its first international success since the World Cup of 1996.
Like always, the Euro will become a shopping mall for club managers to choose their stars from.
Here comes the names of few players gearing up to make their move.
Name: Alvaro Morata (Spain)
Age: 23
Position: Striker
Current Club: Juventus
Name: Antoine Greizmann (France)
Age: 25
Position: Forward
Current Club: Atletico
Name: Zlatan Ibrahimovic (Sweden)
Age: 34
Position: Forward
Current Club: PSG
Name: Christian Benteke (Belgium)
Age: 25
Position: Forward
Current Club: Liverpool
